instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message: i have a macbook pro that is only pulling .08 amps and with a new battery it is pulling the same.  i have ordered a new magsafe connector is there anything eles i check on board? thanks

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message: The basic voltages and signals for power on sequence...

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message: is it possible to get the schematics from you

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message: I'm so sorry for such an amateur question but how do I locate the main logic board number? Not just on this MacBook but on any MacBook, im having a very hard time finding information on how to find it.

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message: Look at the corner near the SSD connector.

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message:
Post exact voltage for PPBUS_G3H and 3V42_G3H.
Keep the battery out.
Be sure to use original 85W Magsafe 2 charger.

threads.title: mc pro a1398 mid 2015
threads.message:
Check diode mode (red probe at ground) on C7140.
Post U7100 basic voltages; pins 1 ,2, 3, 9, 12, 13, 14, 15, 17, 19, 20, 27.
